phrs.translation: 共享颐年优先配屋计划

sentences.sentence: Many elderly people live in poverty.
sentences.translation: 许多老年人生活于贫困之中。

sentences.sentence: One elderly man sat morosely at the bar.
sentences.translation: 一个上了年纪的男人郁郁寡欢地坐在吧台。

sentences.sentence: There was an elderly couple on the terrace.
sentences.translation: 露台上有一对上年纪的老人。
